name: Silk Road
description:
Silk Road is a game jam game for the first edition of mini game jam 2023.
The theme was web and there is no ground

Controlling a little spiderling, your goal is to explore all the islands and create a web of roads to travel on. 
Meeting friends or foes is your decision, as long as you give your best uncovering all there is to offer.

WASD to move
LMB to shoot string whip
RMB + Drag to yeet yourself
1,2,3 to switch string type

!! WEBGL version has problems with the strings, for the full experience I'd love you to download the client. !!
